name: STARHERO
description:
A simplistic precise platformer you will come across 6 distinct worlds and 100+ mini levels all with unique mechanics, from the sea to a volcano, desert to a swamp. You'll be sure to see a some background sights along the way. 

For an extra challenge, try to find all gems and try and get through with as few deaths as possible.

[Controls]

Keyboard Config 1:

[A], [D] = Left, Right Movement

[SPACE] = Jump

Keyboard Config 2:

[<], [>] = Left, Right Movement

[SPACE] = Jump
